subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: It took longer than expected, but Lance Stephenson, a McDonald’s all-American from Lincoln High School in Brooklyn, finally picked his next basketball team. He signed to play for the University of Cincinnati. The 6-foot-5 Stephenson won a record four straight Public School Athletic League Class AA titles and became the state’s career scoring leader with 2,946 points. A misdemeanor sexual assault charge against Stephenson was one factor that had clouded his college choice. The case has been adjourned until July 15.
